paragraph: These modules represent a specific set of business use cases, which can be characterised as business domains.

title: Mapping Module
paragraph: This modules provides the functionality to allow users to produce complex maps between SNOMED CT and other terminologies.

title: Licensing Module
paragraph: This module provides a common set of functionality to enable licensing of SC and its derivative products.

title: Refset Management Module
paragraph: Refset functionality is covered in two areas of the OTF. This services module covers the front end business requirements including management and editing of reference sets.

title: Translation Module
paragraph: The Translation Module provides the functionality for users to include different languages in the terminology and specifically in a member's national extension.

title: Terminology Authoring Module
paragraph: This is the module which will propvide the interface which enables the terminology itself to be modified, updated and added to.

title: Member Exchange Module
paragraph: This will provide an area where IHTSDO Members & Affiliates can share and download different IHTSDO artefacts including reference sets and ...

title: Content Request Module
paragraph: This module provices functionality for external stakeholders to submit content requests for the main SNOMED CT.

title: Namespace Module
paragraph: This module is used to provide management functionality on the application of namespaces.

title: Documentation Module
paragraph: This module provides a common set of functionality to ensure that documentation is common across all areas.
